highlighted phrase: in humans it has been proposed that this system involves a scaffold protein ( iscu ) ( 19 ) , a cysteine desulfurase consisting of two subunits , nfs1 ( homologous to iscs ) and isd11 ( no bacterial homologue found ) , a dnaj - type co - chaperone ( hsc20 ) , and a dnak - like chaperone ( mthsp70 ) ( 6 , 19 ) .
